answers.answer: I was anemic when I was in high school so my mom pounded it in my head to take iron pills with my prenatal vitamins. I use nature made 65 mg. they're super tiny but I always eat with my vitamins. One day I took them on an empty stomach and I threw up and it was the nastiest taste ever!

Same thing is happening to me but im not going to take the pill instead what I'm doing is eating anything that gives iron like soy beans,lentils, whole grains, red apples etc and its really helping me a lot
I recently went also maybe about a week ago & they told me I was anemic too. I couldn't take the pill so I'm taking it in liquid form.
Same here lol i went monday passed my sugar test but low on iron. This is my third pregnancy and it seems this my "normal" because ive been anemic with my other two. This time not as bad though.
I also had the same diagnosis...it is my first baby ... how does being anemic the baby??

question: so I did the gestational diabetes test and the iron check at 28 weeks and they informed me that I passed the diabetes part but my iron is low and I gotta start a iron supplement.  A girl I know said the pill they gave her pass out.  What's a good one to take?
title: Iron supplement
